Home.title: Welcome to Silent Havoc
Home.about: Our team was founded in July 2025 and started its activities in September 2025. Silent Havoc plays or provides support as a silent and destructive force, based on the tactics of the Underwater Assault Team (S.A.T) in Turkey and Marine Special Forces (U.S. Navy Special Forces) abroad.

Donate.title: Support Us
Donate.text: You can support us and contribute to our projects by donating through the links below.

Job.content: We’re looking for new members who are passionate about airsoft and have a strong sense of teamwork! We’re a disciplined, adrenaline-filled, and fun-loving team. Experience doesn’t matter — what matters is your enthusiasm and respect for the rules. If you’re ready to take your place on the field, join us!

Subscribe.title: Subscribe
Subscribe.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to stay informed about our game schedule and updates.

Card.Title: Airsoft Rules
Card.Description: Please make sure to read the rules before playing

Sections.title: General Rules
items: IN TURKEY, MANY GROUPS HAVE THEIR OWN RULES. HERE, ONLY THE GENERAL RULES ARE LISTED.
STRICTLY COMPLY WITH THE REPUBLIC OF TURKEY, THE TURKISH FLAG, AND TURKISH LAWS AND SOCIAL NORMS.
YOU MUST BE AT LEAST 18 YEARS OLD TO PLAY AIRSOFT IN TURKEY.
IT IS STRICTLY FORBIDDEN TO USE PROFANITY, INSULTS, PROVOCATIVE OR SENSITIVE REMARKS IN THE FIELD OR ON SOCIAL MEDIA PLATFORMS.
IT IS STRICTLY FORBIDDEN TO SPEAK DISRESPECTFULLY, SWEAR, OR PROVOKE EITHER WITHIN YOUR TEAM OR TOWARDS OPPONENT PLAYERS IN GAME AREAS.
RELIGION, LANGUAGE, ETHNICITY, POLITICAL VIEWS, AND FOOTBALL ARE STRICTLY PROHIBITED WITHIN THE AIRSOFT COMMUNITY.
ALL AIRSOFT PLAYERS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR MAINTAINING THE CLEANLINESS OF THE GAME AREA.
IN CASE OF ANY NEGATIVE INCIDENT, THE NEAREST LAW ENFORCEMENT AUTHORITIES MUST BE INFORMED.
WHEN TRANSPORTING TOYS, AN ORANGE TIP MUST BE ATTACHED, AND THEY MUST BE CARRIED IN A WAY THAT IS NOT VISIBLE OR DISPLAYED, SUCH AS INSIDE BAGS OR CASES.

Sections.title: Toy Usage Rules
items: AIRSOFT TOYS USE ONLY 6mm PLASTIC BBs.
THE POWER OF THE TOYS IS MEASURED IN 'FPS' (feet per second).
PISTOLS (330 FPS): PISTOLS MUST HAVE A MAXIMUM POWER OF 330 FPS AND CANNOT BE USED BELOW 5 METERS.
RIFLES: (330 FPS CQB) THESE RIFLES ARE DESIGNED FOR CLOSE QUARTERS AND, LIKE PISTOLS, CANNOT BE USED UNDER 5 METERS.
(400 FPS ASSAULT) THESE LIMITED-POWER RIFLES CANNOT BE USED BELOW 10 METERS.
(400 FPS LIGHT MACHINE GUN) THESE RIFLES FIRE RAPIDLY AND THEREFORE CANNOT BE USED UNDER 20 METERS. (M60, RPK, M249, etc.)
GAS-POWERED RIFLES AND THEIR POWER LEVELS ARE ALSO SUBJECT TO THESE RULES.
SNIPER RIFLES: (550 FPS BOLT ACTION) THESE RIFLES ARE VERY POWERFUL WITH HEAVY BBs AND CANNOT BE USED UNDER 30 METERS.
(450 FPS SEMI-SNIPER) THESE RIFLES CANNOT BE USED UNDER 20 METERS.

Sections.title: In-Game Rules
items: IF TWO PLAYERS ENCOUNTER EACH OTHER AND BOTH CLAIM TO HAVE HIT THE OTHER, BOTH PLAYERS MUST LEAVE THE GAME.
PLAYERS MUST NOT LEAVE THE DESIGNATED PLAY AREA TO GAIN AN ADVANTAGE OVER OPPONENTS. (IN SHORT, LEAVING THE MAP IS FORBIDDEN).
IT IS FORBIDDEN TO REMOVE YOUR PROTECTIVE BALLISTIC GOGGLES UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES DURING THE GAME.
AFTER BEING HIT, EVERY PLAYER MUST RAISE THEIR HAND AND VERBALLY CALL OUT 'HIT' WHEN TURNING CORNERS TO PREVENT ACCIDENTS.
AFTER BEING HIT, EVERY PLAYER MUST WEAR A BRIGHT, FLUORESCENT, OR NON-CAMOUFLAGED COLORED CLOTH TO INDICATE ELIMINATION.
IT IS STRICTLY FORBIDDEN TO FIRE TOYS INSIDE THE SAFE ZONE.
IT IS FORBIDDEN TO INTERCEPT OR LISTEN TO THE OPPOSING TEAM'S RADIO FREQUENCY DURING THE GAME.
A PLAYER WHO HAS BEEN HIT CANNOT SPEAK, GIVE TACTICS, OR REVEAL ENEMY POSITIONS.
IN CASE OF A SILENT KILL (FAKE KNIFE), THE ELIMINATED PLAYER MUST LEAVE THE FIELD QUIETLY WITHOUT AFFECTING THE GAME FLOW.
IF YOU BELIEVE A BB HAS HIT YOU, YOU MUST LEAVE THE GAME. EVEN IF YOU ARE UNSURE, YOU SHOULD STILL LEAVE.
DO NOT USE ANY FLAMMABLE OR EXPLOSIVE MATERIALS IN FOREST AREAS. SMOKING IS STRICTLY FORBIDDEN DURING THE GAME.
